Our customers kept asking for a topical rose spray.

After all, the Bulgarian Rose has been used for centuries to calm, nourish, and restore the skin.

So we asked ourselves â€” does the world really need another rose spray?

When we looked around, we saw shelves filled with diluted rose waters â€” preserved with alcohols, hidden under synthetic fragrances, packaged in clear plastic that wastes both purity and planet.

We knew we could do better.

So we co-created Pure Rose Mist together with you â€” our community â€” asking what truly mattered. You told us: purity, potency, sustainability.

The result: a two-ingredient masterpiece â€” Pure Rose Nectar and Organic Bulgarian Rose Oil â€” bottled in amber glass to preserve its living essence and designed to be refilled, not discarded.

Itâ€™s more than a mist â€” itâ€™s a return to whatâ€™s real, and a reminder that simplicity, done right, is luxury.
